text: Parassala Pachan Payyannur Paramu is a 1999 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. Venu, starring Jagathy Sreekumar and Sreenivasan in the lead role. ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar as Parasala Pachan * Sreenivasan as Payyanoor Paramu * Sainudeen * Janardanan as Const.Vasudevan * Sreejaya Nair as Maneesha * Rajan P Dev * Ramyasree * Kavya Madhavan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by P. Venu
title: Parassala Pachan Payyannur Paramu
